instructions.reason_for_call: You want to return the speaker that is more expensive yet not resistent to water. Also, You want to modify the 17-inch laptop to the 13-inch version in another order. If no exact item is available, you want to know all available 13-inch options, and you prefer i5 over i7, and prefer silver and black than other colors.
instructions.known_info: You are aarav_santos_2259 and aarav.santos8321@example.com and aarav.santos8320@example.com.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

I want to return a speaker I bought. It's more expensive but it's not water resistant like it was supposed to be. Also, I have another order with a 17-inch laptop, and I want to change it to a 13-inch version. If you don't have the exact one, just tell me all the 13-inch options you have. I prefer i5 over i7 processors and silver or black colors over anything else. Hurry up.

message.content: I want to return a speaker I bought. It's more expensive but it's not water resistant like it was supposed to be. Also, I have another order with a 17-inch laptop, and I want to change it to a 13-inch version. If you don't have the exact one, just tell me all the 13-inch options you have. I prefer i5 over i7 processors and silver or black colors over anything else. Hurry up.
